name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WAexport: Export WhatsApp Chats and Contacts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export WhatsApp contacts from groups and chats. Download and Save your chat history in HTML (web view), CSV or plain text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download/Backup your WhatsApp chats and contacts in just a few clicks.

Whether you’re looking to backup and store chats or get a list of all contact in a group, WAexport makes it easy to capture your WhatsApp data in just a few clicks.

*Export/Backup WhatsApp Chats*

Export/Backup your chats in multiple formats, including HTML, CSV, and TXT, ensuring compatibility with various tools and platforms.

Whether you need a visually rich HTML file (web view) for easy readability or a CSV file to integrate with other data, WAexport has you covered.

*Export Contacts*

For contacts, WAexport offers flexibility like never before. You can download contact lists from all your groups and individual chats, or if you prefer, select specific groups to export.

This means you can easily manage your contacts, organize your network, or even use the data for more targeted outreach—all in a format that works for you
